item.title: Some useful GPG commands
item.description: Some useful gpg commands I recently ran into a problem with some gpg encrypted file, where the files were encrypted with another key than they were supposed to. Therefore I had to reencrypt them with another key. Every time I run into an unusual task with OpenGPG I find myself banging my head into a wall of useless documentation. Hereâ€™s some of the useful commands I found which let me resolve the issue:
